document_data.name: Forcewave
document_data.mainbody: '''''Forcewave''''' was a rare [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell created a wave of force. The wave was powerful and caused significant damage to a targeted creature. It looked like a large oceanic wave.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[spell focus|focus]], a short length of string and a drop of water.
document_data.History: This spell was one of the spells found in ''[[Laeral's Libram]]''.
